changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Cosmetic( cosmetic_id serial, first_name varchar(255) not null , last_name varchar(255) not null , phone_number varchar(14), email varchar(255) not null , constraint pk_cosmetic_id primary key (cosmetic_id) )

changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Service_type( type_id serial, service_type varchar(50) not null , constraint pk_type_id primary key (type_id) )

insert into Service_type(service_type) values ('hair-cutting'), ('hair-colouring'), ('hair-styling'), ('waxing'), ('nail treatment'), ('facial care'), ('skin care'), ('tanning'), ('massage'), ('complementary care')

changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Service_status( status_id serial, service_status varchar(50) not null , constraint pk_status_id primary key (status_id) )

changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Client( client_id serial, first_name varchar(255) not null , last_name varchar(255) not null , money int, phone_number varchar(14) unique , email varchar(255) unique not null , id_code varchar(11) unique not null , date_of_birth date not null , home_address varchar(255) not null , constraint pk_client_id primary key (client_id) )
alter table Client alter column money set default 0

changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Salon_service( service_id serial, name varchar(255) not null , price int, type_id int, duration int, starting_time date, status_id int, cosmetic_id int, constraint pk_service_id primary key (service_id), constraint fk_cosmetic_id_cosmetic_id foreign key (cosmetic_id) references Cosmetic(cosmetic_id), constraint fk_type_id_type_id foreign key (type_id) references Service_type(type_id), constraint fk_status_id_status_id foreign key (status_id) references Service_status(status_id) )

changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Registration( registration_id serial, service_id int, client_id int, registration_date date, constraint pk_registration_id primary key (registration_id), constraint fk_service_id_service_id foreign key (service_id) references Salon_service(service_id), constraint fk_client_id_client_id foreign key (client_id) references Client(client_id) )

changeSet.author: mattuu
changeSet.sql: create table Users( user_id serial, password varchar(30) unique not null , constraint pk_user_id primary key (user_id), constraint fk_user_id_client_id foreign key (user_id) references Client(client_id) )
